basic.description:
Lecture courses on selected topics in the area of developmental psychology offered periodically.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Selected Topics in Developmental Psychology

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       PSYC203 and PSYC251
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from PSYC350; PSYC457
